message: Re-enabled the 'prevent phone from sleeping' capability for iOS, after determining that it works for iOS... just not the test devices since the debugger is preventing sleep

message: per issue #13 fixed CSS for nearby panel. See commit note in issue #13

title: Unticketed improvement: initTestConnectivity() replaced with a smarter ongoing…
message: Unticketed improvement: initTestConnectivity() replaced with a smarter ongoing test, checking when connection changes from up to down, then switching to offline mode at that time

title: Trivial typo fix
message: Trivial typo fix

title: Minor update to comments during testing
message: Minor update to comments during testing

title: Unticketed UI changes: Find buttons changed back to the more-hierarchical…
message: Unticketed UI changes: Find buttons changed back to the more-hierarchical approach. Minor whiespace adjustments.

title: Unticketed cosmetic changes: Wording changes on Settings panel. Map buttons…
message: Unticketed cosmetic changes: Wording changes on Settings panel. Map buttons always on right, e.g. Find and Settings panel

title: Per issue #11 some more testing/fixing on the GPS readout (div.fakeinput) on the Settings panel
message: Per issue #11 some more testing/fixing on the GPS readout (div.fakeinput) on the Settings panel

title: Per issue #12, improvement: the alert when new locations are found, gives the…
message: Per issue #12, improvement: the alert when new locations are found, gives the option to show the results (page-find-results) or to simply dismiss

title: More for issue #12 - fixes found during testing, and minor refactoring for future debugging
message: More for issue #12 - fixes found during testing, and minor refactoring for future debugging

title: Per issue #12 a major reworking and refactoring of the Nearby system, both…
message: Per issue #12 a major reworking and refactoring of the Nearby system, both interactive searching and automated on-location-change updating/alerting

title: Unticketed cosmetic: When showing the detailed info for Loops, if there are less…
message: Unticketed cosmetic: When showing the detailed info for Loops, if there are less than 4 steps in the Directions then the Directions are simply stripped out. This prevents odd diections such as Start On X Trail, End.

title: Unticketed: Details panel: the fetched HTML will be stripped of any hyperlinks,…
message: Unticketed: Details panel: the fetched HTML will be stripped of any hyperlinks, so as not to create unexpected surprises when viewing more info in a browser

title: Unticketed directions fix: Total distance and time are FIRST on the list, rather…
message: Unticketed directions fix: Total distance and time are FIRST on the list, rather than LAST. And Car is now the default directions, not Hike.

title: Unticketed cosmetic fix: allow line wrapping in titles in listviews
message: Unticketed cosmetic fix: allow line wrapping in titles in listviews

title: Unticketed: Cosmetic issue: Directions panel was not hiding the elevation…
message: Unticketed: Cosmetic issue: Directions panel was not hiding the elevation profile chart, which is applicable to hike and bike directions only

title: Unticketed: Click map for tralpiece info, Directions Here. Links had been broken…
message: Unticketed: Click map for tralpiece info, Directions Here. Links had been broken by change of Directions button. Fixed.

title: Unticketed: When fetching directions, clear any previous highlighted markers, loops, trails, ...
message: Unticketed: When fetching directions, clear any previous highlighted markers, loops, trails, ...

title: Settings panel CSS: removed some outdated references to the legend, and improved…
message: Settings panel CSS: removed some outdated references to the legend, and improved the width percentages of the GPS Location readout

title: Wrap-up for issue #10 -- Your preference of preventing sleep, is now preserved…
message: Wrap-up for issue #10 -- Your preference of preventing sleep, is now preserved between runs of the app

title: Tile seeding work: Sedding Progress button is hidden when app first loads, since…
message: Tile seeding work: Sedding Progress button is hidden when app first loads, since there is no seeding in progress

title: Apropos to Issue #10 the Prevent Sleep option (the whole Advanced settings…
message: Apropos to Issue #10 the Prevent Sleep option (the whole Advanced settings section) is hidden under IOS, as it is relevant only to Android

title: Relevant to issue #10 Minor typo/capitalization fix
message: Relevant to issue #10 Minor typo/capitalization fix

message: Expanding into issue #10, there is now a button in Settings to toggle whether sleeping is to be prevented.

message: Tile cache seeding: Extensive reworking of the UI and workflow.

message: Prevent phone from sleeping. Insomnia plugin.

message: Find panel: new icons for the list of search options: POIs, Trails, Loops, Prior

message: Apropos to issue #8 This is some new icons for the map panel. New SVGs for the bottom bar, and a more robust on/off toggle for the GPS image following suit with other image-toggle behaviors

message: Pertinent to issue #6 this is a enw Directions icon for the Details panel

title: Getting rid of a bunch of images we do not use.
message: Getting rid of a bunch of images we do not use.

title: Directions: Paek feature autocomplete: Stylistic adjustments. Removing the Did…
message: Directions: Paek feature autocomplete: Stylistic adjustments. Removing the Did You Mean line and then making it a inset listview, improves the visuals significantly.

title: Map panel: Directions button was not appearig when one requests Directions.…
message: Map panel: Directions button was not appearig when one requests Directions. Fixed the jQuery selectors to find the 'toolbar' at its new 'location'

title: Permissions: Removed some permissions that were requested by the Media plugin…
message: Permissions: Removed some permissions that were requested by the Media plugin but aren't required for simply PLAYING the beep tone. Removed permissions: RECORD_AUDIO, READ_PHONE_STATE

title: div.alert CSS changed to be less ugly: black and brown, not yellow and red
message: div.alert CSS changed to be less ugly: black and brown, not yellow and red

title: Replaced the mobilealert() concept with Cordova doalogs plugin. Less code for…
message: Replaced the mobilealert() concept with Cordova doalogs plugin. Less code for me, more-native popups for the end user.

title: Fix for yesterday's Directions changes (Issue #6) Moving the button broke the…
message: Fix for yesterday's Directions changes (Issue #6) Moving the button broke the 'Directions' links in popups. Fixed.

title: Android Manifest: using Play as the app_label and Come Out And Play as the…
message: Android Manifest: using Play as the app_label and Come Out And Play as the app_name, was causing problems with installation. Maybe a security feature installing from non-Market?

title: Minor changes to iOS plist: supported platforms, verison numbers
message: Minor changes to iOS plist: supported platforms, verison numbers

title: Automatic aving of tiles to offline storage (tileload event) Added extra check…
message: Automatic aving of tiles to offline storage (tileload event) Added extra check that file is not already onboard, to prevent downloading it a second time needlessly

title: nearby: removed 100' and 250' options, since real-world accuracy varies too much…
message: nearby: removed 100' and 250' options, since real-world accuracy varies too much for this to be truly useful

title: Location pinging every 3 seconds: handleLocationFound() has some…
message: Location pinging every 3 seconds: handleLocationFound() has some more-intelligent behaviors if your movement was under a threshold (50 meters), e.g. why re-run Nearby or re-sort the list, if we're within a coarse-accuracy margin of error

title: Location pinging now takes place explicitly every 2 seconds, rather than using…
message: Location pinging now takes place explicitly every 2 seconds, rather than using the geolocation watch capabiity. This gives updates more consistently, than relying on the device to decide that a one's location has changed enough to warrant an update.

title: Tile seeding for reservations: Various usability enhancements, Cancel button,…
message: Tile seeding for reservations: Various usability enhancements, Cancel button, Cancel button landing on the correct page (seedLayerByIndex() using cancelbutton instead of hardcoded destination page), Name of reservation is placed on the progress page

title: Ability to cache for offline, specifically-selected Reservations. First draft, UI needs work.
message: Ability to cache for offline, specifically-selected Reservations. First draft, UI needs work.

title: Settings panel: back button no longer says Apply since it doesn't apply anything.
message: Settings panel: back button no longer says Apply since it doesn't apply anything.

title: Settings panel: back button no longer says Apply since it doesn't apply anything.
message: Settings panel: back button no longer says Apply since it doesn't apply anything.

title: A patch to the prior commit 5846843 regarding the filenames used when storing tles for offline use
message: A patch to the prior commit 5846843 regarding the filenames used when storing tles for offline use

title: No issue listed, client request: Offline tile caching now takes place while you…
message: No issue listed, client request: Offline tile caching now takes place while you pan and zoom the map. cache.js now has insertOrReplaceTileByUrl() method to manually specify a URL, XYZ, layername and have it saved. BASEMAPS['terrain'] (but not satellite) has a on-tileload event handler to call this capability, and stow the just-now-loaded tile to the cache storage

title: The Fin tree, al pages now have Find to return to the Find page and a Map to go to the map
message: The Fin tree, al pages now have Find to return to the Find page and a Map to go to the map

title: Loop Finder: duration filter has been suppressed. Removed it entirely,…
message: Loop Finder: duration filter has been suppressed. Removed it entirely, hardcoding the values in initFindLoops()

message: Per prior commit 0becbed Some more SVGs

message: Per issue #6 some new SVGs have been uploaded for Trail Finder and Loop Finder. Leaving this open, pending final approval of these (not quite identical to those for Directions) and addition of the Distance filter SVGs

title: Per issue #6 the Directions panel has been reworked, as has the Details panel…
message: Per issue #6 the Directions panel has been reworked, as has the Details panel and how it links to Directions.

title: A bunch of minor items re toggleGPS(): dragging the map manually will call…
message: A bunch of minor items re toggleGPS(): dragging the map manually will call toggleGPSOff()   toggleGPSOn() will now fetch location immediately rather than aiting for the next passive location update. Better response time to the end user.    The GPS button over the map, will now swallow the tap event so as not to make a WMS query to the map.

title: Location errors and successful location events with poor accuracy: There are now…
message: Location errors and successful location events with poor accuracy: There are now 3 messages, and notably this distiguishes between location failure and a location with poor accuracy.

title: Seeding of offline tiles: Cancel button really works now, terminating the…
message: Seeding of offline tiles: Cancel button really works now, terminating the cache's behavior of proceeding to the next tle

title: Added to the basemaps an errorTileUrl, and also a PNG file for it. When using…
message: Added to the basemaps an errorTileUrl, and also a PNG file for it. When using offline mode and a tile cannot be had, this 'No Data' image fills the gaps nicely, alleviating confusion as to why the map 'suddenly stopped working'

title: Per change list: MAX_ZOOM and MAX_CACHING_ZOOMLEVEL are not the same, and…
message: Per change list: MAX_ZOOM and MAX_CACHING_ZOOMLEVEL are not the same, and offline caching goes only to level 16. Switching to online/offline will adjust map's max-zoom, and if necessary will change basemaps and zoom out to MAX_CACHING_ZOOMLEVEL is already closer tan that

message: Performing a Keyword Search, without giving a keyword, now loudly returns an error message instead of doing nothing

title: Added a conectivity test when the app first loads. Thus it can bail when it…
message: Added a conectivity test when the app first loads. Thus it can bail when it first starts, rather than leaving the user with an odd situation of a map with no tiles and noe rror either.

title: Map panel: Location warnings: Now in blue, white background, some opacity. Also…
message: Map panel: Location warnings: Now in blue, white background, some opacity. Also added width detection so the 75% width is only 50% on wider screens.

message: Map panel: Directions option now has class='hide' so it's not visible when the app first starts (it goes away in a moment cuz there are no Directions yet)

message: Directions panel now has Map button, to switch to map. This supplement's the Map's Directions button to go back to the directions.

title: CSS change: Button bar on map, hiding the white borders. The Directions button…
message: CSS change: Button bar on map, hiding the white borders. The Directions button is intended to disappear and reappear, which works poorly with the first-child and last-child borders. Can reinstate them if needed, using jQuery to toggle some additional CSS class
